name: Eudia Transcription Plugin
description: Record meetings, transcribe with AI, sync to Salesforce. Native calendar integration, smart tagging, and precision sales intelligence extraction.
author: Eudia
releaseNotes: v4.9.0: CS template, live query sidebar, AirPods auto-handling, Eudia name correction, speaker diarization, chunked transcription retry with gap markers, one-click retry command, recording telemetry, SHA-256 update verification, double-write audio safety net.
